author: craigmcc
msg: Set the connection to non-auto-commit mode, so that some JDBC drivers (in particular MM.MySql 2.0.4) do not complaing when commit() is called in the default (auto-commit) mode.

author: craigmcc
msg: Enhance the return value for the "Content-Language" header to include the
country code, if specified.  Now, if you call
the header that is created will be:
in accordance with the requirements of Section 3.10 of the HTTP/1.1 spec.

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a simple test for session event listeners.

author: craigmcc
msg: Catalina:  Restore the recognition of <Logger>, <Realm>, and <Valve>
elements nested inside a <Context>.  They were only being recognized
{Context,Engine,Host}Config: Inherit the debugging detail level of the
owning component to assist in debugging problems like this.

author: amyroh
msg: Add SSI "include" tests using golden files.
